One sign pointing to a gubernatorial campaign is that he's already scheduled to speak during at least nine GOP county dinners in Indiana this winter and spring. Certainly if a person was going to be running for president of the United States, I think he'd probably be doing more Lincoln Days in Iowa and New Hampshire than he would in Indiana. That's just the pure reality of the matter, said Howard County GOP Chairman Craig Dunn , who has lined up Mike Pence to speak at a dinner in Kokomo on March 22.
